::Koj::
Koj doesn't pay any attention to the novices opinion's of his tactics and is 
more concerned with Lunarpine smelling the area. Thinks a what master  
Fe-Ling said.


::Fe-Ling::
"Son Koj a ninja can take on many disguises but ones scent always remains 
the same even in disguise never allow your scent to be aquired by any beast 
then you find you lose the advantage of surprise."

::Koj::
Koj quickly reacts as the slot on his right arm releases a baseball sized 
Pepper Bomb. Koj takes the ball and crushes it swiftly releasing a quick 
colorless strong odor as he spins his lance extreme fast blowing it towards 
in Lunarpine. ((The odor will mess with everyones nose in the area it will 
make your eyes water and nose if you have one burn like its on fire locking 
out any scent but spicy peppers.))Koj nose burns but he forgets the feeling 
as he enters battle mode his armor closes of all access to his joints for 
protection "Lunarpine if so much as try and smell me or Inu, I'll remove 
F**king nose!" Koj thrust the lance into the ground to let him know this is 
no joke.
